mapper.select: select c.*, aw.id artid, aw.name artname from tbl_category c left join ( select a.id, a.name, a.cateid from tbl_article as a where a.isdel=0 and a.recom = 1 and #{num} > ( select count(*) from tbl_article aa where aa.isdel=0 and aa.recom=1 and aa.cateid = a.cateid and aa.id > a.id ) order by a.id desc ) as aw on c.id = aw.cateid where c.isdel=0
